product_name: The North Face Insulated Juneau Down Jacket - Women's
long_description: You don't have to live in Alaska to rock this winter jacket! The North Face Juneau down jacket supplies waterproof, breathable, fully seam-sealed protection with lofty goose down for winter warmth. Longer silhouette rests mid-thigh for greater coverage to guard against chill. HyVent(R) 2-layer shell offers a seam-sealed, waterproof and breathable shield against the elements. Warm, 550-fill-power goose down insulation offers superior warmth. Hood with removable faux-fur trim provides cozy comfort. Full-length front zipper with snap-close stormflap. Internal stretch cuffs hold in warmth. Encased elastic at back waist adds shape to the Juneau jacket while holding in warmth. Zippered vertical pockets are placed at high torso-the perfect spot to warm hands while on the move. Double-entry cargo pockets and sleeve pocket have D-ring hidden snap closures. The North Face Juneau down jacket features an internal security pocket with a headphone cord port.
short_description: You don't have to live in Alaska to rock this winter jacket! The North Face Juneau down jacket supplies waterproof, breathable, fully seam-sealed protection with lofty goose down for winter warmth.
